name: Awitu
description:
Your goal is to survive as long as possible and get as powerful as possible by collecting as many upgrades as possible. Kill enemies quickly to get more power ups or they will become too powerful for even you to handle. Every 5 minutes enemies will exponentially get more powerful so prepare for the worst and get powerful quickly.

The assets in this game are primarily taken from OpenGameArt.org and are licensed under CC0. If people want me to release the coins and the icons for them onto that website under a CC0 license let me know and I will do so. The topology on the coins isn't the best, but it works and I understand the programmer struggle of not having art.
